keyFindings: REST API exposes 23 endpoints via API Gateway
DynamoDB for operational data, Neo4j for graph queries
Lambda functions process async jobs via SQS queues
questionsForUser: Should I include the third-party integrations (GitHub API, Okta)?
Are the shared dependencies (tabularium, janus-framework) in scope?

userResponse.feedback: Architecture looks correct. Please include GitHub API integration in scope - we authenticate users via GitHub OAuth.
